attributes.action: Reduce UK Spouse Visa salary from £18,600 to £15,000
attributes.additional_details:
Home Office visa delay 'inhumane': https://www.google.co.uk/amp/s/www.bbc.co.uk/news/amp/uk-england-41096675

Home Office delays "I've yet to meet my second son": http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-41324232

Home Office delays "We are living in virtual prison": https://www.google.co.uk/amp/s/www.bbc.co.uk/news/amp/uk-england-41324228
attributes.background:
This petition calls on the Conservative government to reduce the spouse visa salary from £18,600 to £15,000.

£18,600 is too HIGH. We demand for it to be reduced in order for couples to live together and not be stressed by this new rule.
